page.title: 08Home Life, Carshalton,Surrey
page.content: On Sunday morning my mum calls me up about 8.3O. When I get downstairs I have breakfast which is cornflakes which has two vitamins. Then I sit down for a minute and do what Jehovah's Witnesses call a Day's text. The main text comes from the bible. When I have got dressed I, dad, mum and my brother go out preaching. When we preach we go round to houses talking about Jehovah's Kingdom which will destroy all wicked people. When we get home we have a hot meal. I may go to my bedroom and look at comics for ten minutes before we go to a Jehovah's meeting. We have a song, prayer and a talk followed by a discussion on points from the bible. When we get home I watch T.V., after supper and a prayer to Jehovah I go to bed with my Teddies. Jo Reynolds (l0)
